item.title: Fox News Politics Newsletter: Mamdani Laughs Off Question About ‘Communist’ Label
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump administration, Capitol Hill and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: State Department says 59,000 tons of food assistance are in motion after reports of incinerated aid

item.title: Pentagon to probe Microsoft's use of Chinese engineers on sensitive defense systems, Hegseth says

item.title: Trump vows to make US ‘crypto capital of the planet,' signs GENIUS Act into law
item.description: Trump signed into law the GENIUS Act on Friday – a landmark piece of legislation that establishes federal regulations surrounding digital currency.
